title: Test the Reversal
summary: Run the loop in reverse. Just once. See what breaks.
description: Every loop follows a pattern. If you disrupt just one piece — you open space. This quest invites an experiment: what happens if you do the opposite?

flow.\ud83d\udd01 Step 1: Name the Default: Message: 'I usually respond to this loop by doing [X]'
flow.\u21a9 Step 2: Try the Opposite: Choose an alternative action — even symbolically. Then reflect: 'I reversed the loop by [Y]'

optional_recast: Repeat the reversal with a different loop or situation later.
absence_response: No reversal attempted today. The loop stayed unchallenged — and that’s okay.
notes: The goal isn’t success. It’s disruption.
Even thinking about reversal creates new neural paths.
Loop reversal is ritual, not rebellion.

amplification.ai_mirror_prompt: What identity shift does this reversal experiment suggest?
amplification.loop_signal: Track reversal actions across common loops.
amplification.miss_response: 🔁 Loop ran unchanged. That’s part of the pattern, too.
